[tr][td][b]Pictures:[/b][/td][/tr][/table] [IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk280/mattias_bucket/catherbyarea.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk280/mattias_bucket/faladorarea.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk280/mattias_bucket/varrockarea.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk280/mattias_bucket/commands.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk280/mattias_bucket/dags1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk280/mattias_bucket/magic.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk280/mattias_bucket/pray1.jpg[/img]
